item.title: 土耳其 8 月通胀率降至 33% 低于预期
item.description: 土耳其 8 月份的通胀放缓幅度低于预期，这进一步表明，即使在土耳其央行准备继续降低利率的情况下，消费需求依然具有弹性。【原文：Turkish inflation slowed less than expected in August, adding to signs that consumer demand remains resilient even as the central bank is poised to keep lowering interest rates.】

item.title: 日本首相石破茂在党内投票前被逼入绝境
item.description: 日本首相石破茂（Shigeru Ishiba）在执政党就其最近选举受挫的情况完成报告后未能平息要求其辞职的呼声，目前约有 150 名议员和地区代表尚未决定是否有效支持将其赶下台。【原文：Embattled Japanese Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba failed to quell calls for his resignation after a ruling party finalized a report on its recent election setback, leaving his fate with 150 or so lawmakers and regional representatives currently undecided on whether to effectively support his ousting.】

item.title: 德国化工厂的运行水平为 1991 年以来最低
item.description: 2025 年第二季度，德国化工行业的运营能力仅为 72%，是 30 多年来最弱的一个季度。【原文：Germany’s chemicals sector operated at just 72% capacity in the second quarter of 2025 — its weakest level in more than 30 years — underscoring the deepening challenges facing both the industry and Europe’s largest economy.】

item.title: 里夫斯有望将英国紧缩预算日期定在 11 月下旬
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）预计将于11月26日宣布公布英国年度财政预算的计划，这一事件对于基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）苦苦挣扎的工党政府来说显得越来越关键。【原文：Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves is expected to announce plans to release the UK’s annual budget on Nov. 26, according to people familiar with the matter, an event looking increasing critical for Keir Starmer’s struggling Labour administration.】

item.title: 希腊总理希望通过减税缓解危机后多年的痛苦
item.description: 在欧洲主权债务危机期间几乎无法想象的财政转机之后，希腊政府准备为该国濒临崩溃的中产阶级推出新的救济措施。【原文：The Greek government is poised to unveil new relief measures for the country’s ailing middle class after a fiscal turnaround that was barely conceivable during Europe’s sovereign debt crisis.】

item.title: 泰国航空公司首席执行官称，航线多样化可缓冲中国游客的减少
item.description: 泰国国际航空公司（Thai Airways International PCL）首席执行官 Chai Eamsiri 表示，泰国国际航空公司多元化的全球市场正在帮助这家泰国国家航空公司抵御前往东南亚国家的中国游客减少的影响。【原文：Thai Airways International PCL’s diversified global markets are buffering Thailand’s national carrier from decreasing Chinese tourists to the Southeast Asian country, according to Chief Executive Officer Chai Eamsiri.】

item.title: 联邦快递扩建利雅得，打造新的中东枢纽
item.description: 联邦快递公司（FedEx Corp. ）在利雅得启动了一个新的地区枢纽，并获得了作为外国航空承运人运营的沙特经济许可证，加深了其对沙特作为中东地区崛起的物流大国的押注。【原文：FedEx Corp. has launched a new regional hub in Riyadh and secured a Saudi economic license to operate as a foreign air carrier, deepening its bet on the kingdom as a rising logistics power in the Middle East.】

item.title: 欧洲在供暖季开始前将迎来温暖的九月
item.description: 在经历了连续的夏季热浪之后，欧洲 9 月份的气温将高于平均水平，并有可能延续到下个月供暖季的开始。【原文：After a succession of summer heat waves, Europe is set for a warmer-than-average September, which could potentially extend into the start of the heating season the following month.】

item.title: 英国富时 100 指数缩水最多的股票康维特因美国医疗保险风波而停牌
item.description: 特朗普政府对医疗保险支出的强硬立场促使人们押注英国医疗科技公司康华特集团（Convatec Group Plc），这是伦敦上市的蓝筹股中被押注最多的公司。【原文：The Trump administration’s toughening stance on Medicare spending is prompting bets against UK medtech Convatec Group Plc, the most-shorted London-listed blue chip.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国资产遭遇重创，英镑延续跌势
沃尔沃重组中国业务，努力应对销售下滑
item.description: 浙江吉利控股集团有限公司（Zhejiang Geely Holding Group Co., Ltd.）控股的瑞典品牌沃尔沃汽车公司（Volvo Car AB）正将更多的权力交给其在中国的高管，因为该汽车制造商希望在竞争激烈的中国市场提高销量。【原文：Volvo Car AB, the Swedish brand controlled by Zhejiang Geely Holding Group Co., is handing more power to its executives in China as the carmaker looks to boost sales in the fiercely competitive local market.】

item.title: 泰国银行行长认为政治漂移存在经济风险
item.description: 即将离任的泰国央行行长塞萨布-素提瓦特那鲁普（Sethaput Suthiwartnarueput）表示，由于泰国的政治僵局，预算可能会被推迟，因此明年泰国经济增长的风险越来越大。【原文：Thailand’s economic growth next year is looking increasingly at risk amid a possible delay in the budget because of the country’s political deadlock, according to outgoing central bank Governor Sethaput Suthiwartnarueput.】

item.title: 日本金融服务管理局敦促农村银行帮助企业获得股权融资
item.description: 日本金融监管机构正在敦促地区银行帮助当地企业获得进一步发展所需的股权融资，这是日本振兴农村经济的广泛努力的一部分。【原文：Japan’s financial regulator is urging regional banks to help local businesses secure equity funding necessary for further growth, as part of the country’s broader drive to revitalize rural economies.】

item.title: 印度影子银行首次公开募股热潮因信贷压力增大而衰退
item.description: 由于整个行业的资金紧张促使贷款机构取消或推迟上市，印度影子银行一度激增的新股销售渠道正在停滞。【原文：India’s once-burgeoning pipeline for new stock sales by shadow banks is stalling as strains across the sector prompt lenders to scrap or delay listings.】

item.title: 日本首相石破茂会见日本央行行长上田讨论经济和市场问题
item.description: 日本首相石破茂会见了日本银行行长上田一夫，双方就经济和金融市场交换了意见。【原文：Japanese Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba met with Bank of Japan Governor Kazuo Ueda to exchange views on the economy and financial markets, as he faced rising pressure from within his party to resign.】

item.title: 全球债券跌势正在扩大，长债领跌
item.description: 全球债券正面临新的抛售压力，因为围绕通胀、售债和财政纪律的忧虑情绪削弱了人们对以往全球最安全资产的信心。【原文：Global bonds are facing renewed selling pressure as jitters around inflation, debt sales and fiscal discipline erode sentiment toward what had previously been some of the world’s safest assets.】

item.title: 全球基金在越南股市反弹后卖出创纪录数量的股票
item.description: 在越南创纪录的股票大涨之后，外国投资者正在缩减仓位，从市场上撤出了前所未有的大量资金。【原文：Foreign investors are scaling back their positions after Vietnam’s record stock rally, pulling out an unprecedented amount of money from the market.】

item.title: 多伦茨称欧洲央行的下一步行动可能是降息或加息
item.description: 斯洛文尼亚央行代理行长普里莫兹-多伦茨（Primoz Dolenc）表示，欧洲央行目前坚定地按兵不动，下一步可能是降息或加息。【原文：European Central Bank interest rates are firmly on hold for now and the next step could be a cut or hike, according to Primoz Dolenc, acting governor of Slovenia’s central bank.】

item.title: 丹斯克银行因诺和诺德困境下调丹麦经济增长预期
item.description: 丹麦最大的贷款机构下调了对丹麦经济的预期，原因是近年来支撑丹麦经济增长的制药巨头诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk A/S）前景暗淡。【原文：Denmark’s largest lender has slashed its forecast for the nation’s economy amid weaker prospects for Novo Nordisk A/S, the pharmaceutical giant that has underpinned growth in recent years.】

item.title: 汇丰银行 AM 通过私募股权基金与同行携手瞄准富裕阶层
item.description: 汇丰控股公司（HSBC Holdings Plc）的资产管理部门正在推出一项针对富裕客户的私募股权投资战略，这是一家大型投资公司为增加面向个人的另类投资产品而采取的最新举措。【原文：HSBC Holdings Plc’s asset management arm is launching a private equity strategy targeting wealthy clients, the latest move by a major investment firm to boost its alternatives offerings for individuals.】

item.title: 通胀率降至 3% 以下，波兰将下调利率
item.description: 由于波兰的通胀率一年多来首次降至 3% 以下，预计波兰将恢复降息。【原文：Poland is expected to resume interest rate cuts as inflation eased below 3% for the first time in more than year.】

item.title: 泰克暂缓增长计划，专注于智利铜矿
item.description: 泰克资源有限公司（Teck Resources Ltd.）正在推迟重大发展项目，以集中精力解决阻碍其智利旗舰矿山Quebrada Blanca铜矿产出的问题。【原文：Teck Resources Ltd. is deferring major growth projects to focus on fixing issues that have held back output at its flagship Quebrada Blanca copper mine in Chile.】

item.title: 铜从五个月高位回落，中国前景扑朔迷离
item.description: 由于交易商权衡顶级市场中国的供需前景，铜在伦敦短暂触及 3 月下旬以来的最高点后有所回落。【原文：Copper cooled after briefly touching its highest since late-March in London, as traders weighed the outlook for supply and demand in top market China.】

item.title: 软银支持的 InMobi 寻求 3.5 亿美元贷款用于股票回购
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，由软银集团支持的移动广告平台 InMobi Group 正在寻求 3.5 亿美元的私人贷款，以备其计划在印度进行的首次公开募股。【原文：InMobi Group, a mobile advertising platform backed by SoftBank Group Corp., is seeking a $350 million private loan ahead of its planned initial public offering in India, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 澳新银行机构银行部开始裁员
item.description: 随着新上任的首席执行官努诺-马托斯（Nuno Matos）加大改革力度，澳新银行集团控股有限公司（ANZ Group Holdings Ltd.）机构银行部已开始裁员。【原文：ANZ Group Holdings Ltd. has begun to let go people within its institutional banking division as an overhaul by newly-installed Chief Executive Officer Nuno Matos ramps up.】

item.title: 摩根大通聘请对冲基金经理负责中国医疗银行业务
item.description: 摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. has hired hedge fund manager Jane Wu to lead China healthcare investment banking, as the industry emerges from a multi-year rout.】

item.title: 关税之痛迫在眉睫，印度股市投资者趋于安全
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 普京在中国能源领域的胜利打击了特朗普的出口努力
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统上任第一天就发誓要建立美国在全球的能源主导地位。七个月过去了，随着世界上最大的进口国在经济和地缘政治上大展拳脚，这一目标正受到威胁。【原文：On his first day in office, President Donald Trump vowed he would establish US energy dominance over the globe. Seven months on, that goal is under threat as the world’s largest importer flexes its economic and geopolitical muscle.】

item.title: 泰国代理总理寻求解散国会，新一轮竞选白热化
item.description: 泰国看守政府领导人蓬丹-威差猜已着手解散议会，可能为提前举行大选铺平道路，以阻止总理巴东塔恩-西那瓦下台后一个敌对组织组建新政府的努力。【原文：Thailand’s caretaker leader, Phumtham Wechayachai, has moved to dissolve parliament, potentially paving the way for an early general election, an effort to block a bid by a rival group to form a new government after Prime Minister Paetongtarn Shinawatra was ousted.】

item.title: 高盛亚洲顶级银行家称中国股市仍有上涨空间
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc.’s top Asia banker sounded an optimistic note on Chinese equities amid resurgent flows and said the firm is hiring in Hong Kong and India.】
